mapper.select: select t.id, u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, c.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, con.source as source, a.name as activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer c on t.customerId=c.id left join tbl_activity a on t.activityId=a.id left join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId=con.id where t.id=#{id}
